headline: Analysts Estimate Halliburton (HAL) to Report a Decline in Earnings: What to Look Out for
summary: Halliburton (HAL) doesn't possess the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.

headline: Halliburton and Nabors Bring Drilling Automation to the Forefront in the Middle East
summary: HOUSTON, April 15, 2025--Halliburton (NYSE: HAL) and Nabors Industries (NYSE: NBR) achieved the first fully automated surface and subsurface execution of rotary and slide drilling operations in Oman. The integration of the companies’ digital solutions delivered land-based, closed-loop drilling solutions to improve operational efficiency, consistency, and real-time decision-making capabilities.
